entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Sunday 12 March 2023
